mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into story (templateId, sort, isAudition, storyName, storyDesc, storyIcon, storyTime, playCount, contentUrl, createtime, modifytime, status ) values (#{templateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isaudition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storydesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storyicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{storytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{playcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{contenturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update story set templateId = #{templateid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, isAudition = #{isaudition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storyName = #{storyname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storyDesc = #{storydesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storyIcon = #{storyicon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, storyTime = #{storytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, playCount = #{playcount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, contentUrl = #{contenturl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createtime = #{createtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifytime = #{modifytime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, templateId, sort, isAudition, storyName, storyDesc, storyIcon, storyTime, playCount, contentUrl, createtime, modifytime, status from story where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
